oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Probably Zuhrī's third edition of the "al-Ṣūrah al-Maʼmūnīya" (al-Maʼmūn's "Mappa Mundi").
قال مؤلف هذه الطفرة من كتاب الجعرافية التي نسخت من جعرفية امير المؤونين المأمون بن هارون الرشيد... :Incipit
تمت الجغرافية بحمد الله تعالى وحسنه والعكام. :Colophon
Written in a regular Maghribi hand in black ink, rubrics in red now faded, 17 lines per page, with annotations in the margin and at the end in other hands.
Bound in full blind-stamped red morocco, with flap.
Paginated 1-138 in a volume in which are also bound: Qaṣīdat al-Hamzīyah / al-Būṣīrī (ff. 139-324) and Dalāʼil al-khayrāt / Jazūlī (ff. 325-388).
MS Arab SM228. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
